text: Good news that Nancy Antoinette has stopped eating her fancy ice cream & allowed a relief bill to come to the floor. Bad news is she’s always looking for ways to slip stuff in to advance her Leftist pet projects--either now or in the next phase. We’re watching, Nancy!
